text:
Mohammad Ayaan Anis Ahmad Shaikh
ayaanskh23@gmail.com | +91 8600301247 | Github | LinkedIn
Machine Learning Engineer specializing in NLP systems, Reinforcement learning
and production ML deployment. Built RAG-based document intelligence systems
and real-time inference pipelines using Python, PyTorch, and FastAPI. Strong
foundation in vector databases, embedding models, and low-latency API design.
